<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> is <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>, to <S%G591>render<s%> to each <S%G1538>man<s%> according <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G2071>is<s%>.
